# Contact the Extreme Sales Team

###  Extreme Expertise Plus Our Trusted Partner Network

### Request a Call 

Our team will get the initial process started by discussing your network requirements, pain points, and goals. This comprehensive assessment will help us provide a customized solution to meet your unique network needs and objectives.

From there, we will introduce you to one of our trusted, experienced and vetted partners to start your order for the components best suited to deliver on the network solution strategy we create for you.

You can rely on Extreme to provide the expert consultation and implementation guidance you need to take your network from a cost center to a profit center.

## Additional Resources

### Locate Extreme Authorized Partners in Your Area

[Find a Partner](/partners/partner-locator "Find a Partner")

### Tailoring Training and Support Options to Meet Your Needs

[Contact Support Team](/support "Support Contact")

## Thank You for Contacting Us!

A sales representative will be following up with you shortly. 

Meanwhile you can check out our [solutions section](/solutions), view our [customers reviews](/about-extreme-networks/our-customers) or browse through our latest [blog posts](###).

## Your Privacy

By clicking “OK”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. [Privacy and Cookies Policy](https://www.extremenetworks.com/company/legal/privacy/)

OK

Cookie Settings

![Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/static/ot_company_logo.png)

## Privacy Preference Center

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer. [Privacy and Cookies Policy](https://www.extremenetworks.com/company/legal/privacy/)

Allow All

###  Manage Consent Preferences

#### Functional Cookies

Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Targeting Cookies

Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
